comment.author: 78266477@N04
comment._content: Caproni Ca.310 OB-GGF from Peruvian Aeronautic Corps. Guidonia, Late July 1939. This aircraft was lost with 2 of its 3 occupants while trying to link Rome and Lima. I would like to obtain a high res copy of this picture if possible. Thanks

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/78266477@N04] Thank you for that information.  Please email Nelson Chase at Nchase@sdasm.org and he can provide you with a hi res copy!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/78266477@N04] Actually, the email arenga@sdasm.org  The email above is out dated! THanks!
